m_szDocTitle: Zenyatta Ventures Ltd. Provides Market and Business Development Update on Albany Graphite - Oil & Gas 360
m_szDocSumamry: Zenyatta Ventures Ltd. Provides Market and Business Development Update on Albany Graphite  November 19, 2015 - 8:30 AM EST close yes               Zenyatta Ventures Ltd. Provides Market and Business Development Update on Albany Graphite THUNDER BAY, ON--(Marketwired - November 19, 2015) - Zenyatta Ventures Ltd. ("Zenyatta" or "Company") (TSX VENTURE: ZEN) is pleased to announce the progress of ongoing programs related to global market and business development of high-purity Albany graphite for various applications. Recently the Company received a new batch of purified graphite material produce
